changeSet.author: Jim
changeSet.sql:
update nhi_procedure set description = 'Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (01271C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '01271C';
            update nhi_procedure set description = 'Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (01272C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '01272C';
            update nhi_procedure set description = 'Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (01273C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '01273C';
